title: CreativeLIVE - Bumps to Babies: Photographing Motherhood with Su
description:
Bumps to Babies: Photographing Motherhood with Sue Bryce and Kelly Brown

World-renowned portrait photographer Sue Bryce and newborn photographer Kelly Brown are joining forces to bring you an unprecedented pregnancy and baby photography workshop. Sue will detail how to work with clients to capture the intimate glamour of motherhood, both pre and post-birth. Kelly will show you how to safely and beautifully photograph babies from the first month through the first year, including her award-winning styling, lighting, and Ã¢â‚¬Å“baby-whispererÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ posing techniques.
